text: Return to Jerusalem. Then Judas assembled all the Israelites, great and small, who were in Gilead, with their wives and children and their goods, a very large company, to go into the land of Judah.
that you may be children of your heavenly Father, for he makes his sun rise on the bad and the good, and causes rain to fall on the just and the unjust.
Do not think that I will accuse you before the Father: the one who will accuse you is Moses, in whom you have placed your hope.
